General.Name: Nxu Inc.
General.Description: Nxu, Inc., a technology company, engages in building megawatt charging stations in the United States. It offers NxuOne, a charging technology that provides repeatable, consistent power delivery, designed to meet the needs of electric vehicles; and battery cells and battery packs for use in energy storage systems and mobility products. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Mesa, Arizona.
General.Address: 1828 N. Higley Rd, Mesa, AZ, United States, 85205
